structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Religious orders exempt from KRS 194A.700 to 194A.729.
law.text: Religious orders providing assistance with activities of daily living, instrumental activities of daily living, and self-administration of medication to vowed members residing in the order's retirement housing shall not be required to comply with the provisions of KRS 194A.700 to 194A.729.
law.history: Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 13, effective July 14, 2000.
